settings.text: An All-In-One Device That Makes Your Music Listening Experience A Pure Delight

settings.content: The FiiO R7 is a feature-rich Digital Audio Player with streaming capabilities and much more. It combines transmitter, decoder, amp, preamp, and media playback functions into one unit. Besides numerous connections, expansion capabilities and a wide variety of operating modes, it can stream media on a gorgeous portrait screen for an extraordinary user experience.

settings.title: Features ES9068AS DAC Chip From ESS Sabre
settings.content: FiiO has incorporated an ESS Sabre ES9068AS DAC chip in its circuitry for the brand-new R7. It is a Hi-Res DAC chip capable of decoding up to 384kHz/32bit PCM (Pulse Code Modulation), Native DSD256 (Direct Stream Digital), and 8X MQA decoding (Master Quality Authenticated).

settings.title: THX Amplification Technology
settings.content: FiiO has developed an optimised audio circuit design for the R7. Following the decoding stage, the signal is fed to discrete opamps under a fully balanced configuration, passing through an I/V stage, low-pass filters, and a gain stage. Then, onto the dual THX AAA 788+ (THX - Tomlinson Holman’s eXperiment/AAA (Achromatic Audio Amplifier) module that does the final bit of amplification to power your headphones.

settings.title: 4th-Generation FPGA Technology
settings.content: The ESS ES9068AS decoder chipset and the 4th-gen FPGA featuring phase-locked loop clock technology and a pair of femtosecond crystal oscillators promise precise and low-jitter clock signals. Audiophile parts such as Panasonic PPS film caps, which provide improved dependability and superior sound qualities, are used in decoding circuitries.

settings.title: 5-Step Gain Settings
settings.content: The FiiO R7 can output more than 3W to headphones rated at 32Ω in impedance, making it among the most potent all-in-one streaming device. To cater to different gears, you can switch between 5 levels of gain settings which allows matching with sensitive IEMs or large over-ear headphones that demand ample power. At the highest gain level with 32Ω load, the R7 can output as much as 3650mW in each channel on Balanced output.

settings.title: Bluetooth 5.0 and Dual-Band WiFi Support
settings.content: FiiO R7 features Bluetooth 5.0; supports reception of LDAC, AAC, & SBC; supports transmission of LHDC, LDAC, aptX HD, aptX, AAC, & SBC. The FiiO R7 also supports dual-band WiFi 5G + 2.4G for faster and more stable connections. It is Roon Ready with Android 10 built-in, supporting various streaming applications like Tidal, Spotify and other streaming services. With a 5G WiFi connection or the even more stable LAN port connection of higher bandwidth, you can stream high-resolution music stably. The FiiO R7 also supports streaming over LDAC on Bluetooth connection, and with Apple products, FiiO suggests using Airplay receiver mode for the best sound quality.

settings.title: 5-Inch Full-Fit Intuitive Touch Screen & Android 10 Open OS
settings.content: FiiO has incorporated a 5-inch (720 * 1280) full-fit screen into the R7. It is a touch-intuitive screen allowing you to control the R7 seamlessly. The FiiO R7 features Android 10 Open OS, allowing you to experience music streaming and other third-party apps like never before. With the Open Android 10 OS, you can have access to Google Play Store, which enables numerous app downloads.

settings.title: Iconic Futuristic Design That Stands Apart
settings.content: The FiiO R7 has an elegant futuristic design that fits perfectly as your Desktop system and stands apart in its own right. A team of engineers at FiiO went through designing multiple prototypes to truly & fully explore the advantages and disadvantages. After much real-world testing and lessons learned, FiiO boldly decided that the R7 would adopt a portrait-oriented display and fit within an elegant and compact package. The gorgeous portrait display also helps to save space with the suave, square R7 on your desk; your desktop HiFi setup comes to life. Thanks to the included protective covers, you don't have to compromise on maintaining good looks on your great-sounding unit.1

settings.title: Numerous Inputs & Outputs for Easy Connectivity and Scalability
settings.content: The FiiO R7 features connectivity far beyond what you would expect from a device with which you can quickly and easily build a desktop HiFi system with the R7 as the heart of it. The front panel has 6.35mm (SE), 4-pin XLR & 4.4mm Balanced headphone outputs. The rear panel is where the magic lies. It hosts a microSD card slot which supports up to 2TB if you like to play offline files on the go. It has Single-Ended RCA and 3-pin XLR Balanced lineouts. Surprisingly it also has a USB host interface that supports external USB devices like decoders, hard disks, keyboards, and expansion hubs. It also offers Optical & Coaxial IN/OUT and an Ethernet port for wired connection to a network. The USB Type-C port (USB 3.0) on the R7 supports data transfer, DP output mode, USB DAC, and USB HOST-related functions. The R7 has a Bluetooth and WiFi antenna embedded into the rear panel with a power switch allowing you to switch between DC or AC power supply seamlessly.

settings.title: 4-Pin XLR Headphone Jack
settings.content: The Balanced connection decreases crosstalk and interference caused by the balanced output configuration resulting in improved audio signal integrity. As a result, the sound is reproduced with improved channel separation and increased dynamic range, making it cleaner and more accurate.

settings.title: 4.4mm Pentaconn Headphone Jack
settings.content: The Balanced connection decreases crosstalk and interference caused by the balanced output configuration resulting in improved audio signal integrity. As a result, the sound is reproduced with improved channel separation and increased dynamic range, making it cleaner and more accurate.

settings.title: 6.35mm Headphone Jack
settings.content: This is the most commonly found headphone jack with which you can pair your less power-demanding headphones. The larger size of the jack provides a secure connection that is less prone to accidental disconnection or damage, ensuring a stable audio signal.

settings.title: Volume Control
settings.content: R7 has a smooth volume knob that has 120 steps of volume control and it also displays the gain which you are currently at when you are toggling between the perfect volume for your set of speakers or headphones.

settings.title: Multiple Operating Modes
settings.content: The FiiO R7 has multiple operating modes to give you the best possible sonic experience. Android Mode allows you to enjoy third-party apps and streaming services. The Pure Music Mode gives you an even more immersive listening experience. The FiiO R7 can also act as a dedicated USB DAC with USB DAC Mode. You can improve the sound quality of your source by connecting them to R7 as a decoder. It also has wireless playback with Bluetooth Receiver Mode that supports LDAC, AAC, and SBC codecs. For iOS devices, it features AirPlay Receiver Mode allowing you to connect iPhone/iPad wirelessly, giving them a boost in sound quality. It also has a Roon Ready Mode making the R7 Roon Ready Certified, giving you an ergonomic player in seconds. The Coaxial/Optical Decoding Mode allows you to receive optical/coaxial signals turning the R7 into a high-performing decoder.

settings.title: Dual Power Supply Design for Clean and Silent Background
settings.content: Electricity is the root of great sound, and the engineers at FiiO have incorporated DC/AC dual power supply design for you to get the ultimate experience. Inside the R7 is a 30W switching power supply. The AC input circuit employs filtering and purification with a large-capacity choke and dedicated high-voltage capacitors. The DC input circuit is of a ±12V high-voltage power supply design. Both power circuits contribute to the robustness of the power supply system to better give that dynamic sound to your music. The FiiO R7 can also be used with external DC power supplies, such as the FiiO PL50 linear power supply or other power supplies giving your sound an even purer, blacker background making the musical details pop.

settings.title: Honeycomb Vents For Heat Dissipation
settings.content: The side honeycomb vents serve as both heat dissipators and as a futuristic touch; A recessed rear panel means more elegant wire connections and less clutter. The seamless WiFi/Bluetooth antenna packs many capabilities in a simple square inch. The customizable RGB lights give your desktop setup some extra personality.

settings.title: Bluetooth Remote Control
settings.content:
Want to listen to your music without having to get up? You can go with the FiiO Music app or a Bluetooth remote control, allowing you to control your music from a distance and conveniently handle various operations. Be truly unshackled when listening.

NOTE: In the future, FiiO will launch a customizable universal Bluetooth remote control.

settings.title: Feature Sets That Make You Ask For Nothing More
settings.content: You have full access to the Google Play Store, and the 5-inch screen is excellent for exploring the stock Android experience. The Fiio R7 is a fantastic network streamer because of the company's proprietary adaptations, which include Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, Roon integration, a MicroSD card slot, and USB-C compatibility. The FiiO R7 can offer a clear sound free of distortion because of the excellent built-in DAC & Amp. The FiiO R7 is a simple solution for your demanding needs. It is capable of many tasks, including a transmitter, streaming media player, decoder, amplifier, and preamp.

settings.title: DLNA & Roon Ready
settings.content: The FiiO R7 acts as your control hub for accessing your music when connected to a NAS and playing music through DLNA. It is Roon Ready certified, allowing you to access music from a ROON CORE source such as a NAS or a computer. And if that is not enough, the R7 itself can act as a network music server thanks to being compatible with the DLNA transmission protocols. Through DLNA, on another device, you can access the music on the R7's internal storage, micro-SD cards, and even tracks on a connected external portable drive.

settings.title: Output Selector Knob
settings.content:
• PO + PRE-OUT

The R7 allows you to switch between your devices and listening modes using the control knob. You can use the R7 in PO+PRE OUT mode, wherein you can connect your powered speakers and your preferred choice of headphones at the same time. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection for PRE-OUT mode.

  • PO

The phone out (PO)  mode is simple and can be used when you just want to listen to your preferred choice of headphones.

  • PRE-OUT

This mode allows you to pair your powered monitors and use the R7 as the source and a preamp for your powered speakers. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection for PRE-OUT mode.

  • LO

Line out (LO)  mode allows you to pair your powered monitors and use the R7 as the source and a preamp for your powered speakers. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection in LO mode.

settings.title: Exclusive DP Mode
settings.content: You can use the exclusive DP mode, to connect to an external display, a tablet for instance, and operate the unit on a bigger screen. This allows you to experience audio and visuals on a bigger screen using R7 as the source.

settings.title: Bluetooth V5.0
settings.content: Enjoy Hi-Res Audio quality without wires thanks to LDAC & aptX HD premium wireless codec.

settings.title: 8X MQA Decoding
settings.content: The New FiiO R7 includes MQA technology, which enables you to play back MQA audio files.

settings.title: FiiO Music App Support
settings.content: You can download the FiiO music app from the Google Play store or App store.

settings.author:
RAGHAV SOMANI

Founder, Headphone Zone
settings.content: Well, FiiO R7 is a device that does almost everything from being a DAC & Amp, a network streamer, preamp and lots more. I have never come across a device that is a jack of all trades and a master to many. It lets you experience new heights of precision, performance, and unparalleled musicality.

settings.content:
Gold Award Winner
VGP
Feb, 2023

Desktop Audio Award
VGP
Feb, 2023
The R7 is a new all-in-one player, DAC, and headphone amplifier from FiiO. It features THX AAA788+ amplifiers, full-balanced outputs, and a strong 3W output within a palm-size metallic housing.

The R7 isn't an average network streamer — it does so much more. The versatility that you're getting here is phenomenal, and Fiio deserves a lot of credit for delivering an all-in-one solution with such an exhaustive feature-set.

settings.title: All You Need To Know About The FiiO  R7

settings.content: {{ product.metafields.hpz.about_brand_on_product_page.value.about | metafield_tag }}

settings.title: What is FiiO R7 on the whole?
settings.content: It is a Hi-Res desktop-grade Digital Audio player. It is capable of many tasks, including a transmitter, streaming media player, decoder, amplifier, and preamp.

settings.title: What are the various inputs/outputs like?
settings.content: The front panel has 6.35mm (SE), 4-pin XLR & 4.4mm Balanced headphone outputs. The FiiO R7 gets you covered with the standard and widely used headphone outputs. The rear panel is where the magic lies. It hosts a microSD card slot which supports up to 2TB if you like to play offline files on the go. It has Single-Ended RCA and 3-pin XLR Balanced lineouts. Surprisingly it also has a USB host interface that supports external USB devices like decoders, hard disks, keyboards, and expansion hubs. It also offers Optical & Coaxial IN/OUT and an Ethernet port for wired connection to a network. The USB Type-C port (USB 3.0) on the FiiO R7 supports data transfer, DP output mode, USB DAC, and USB HOST-related functions. The FiiO R7 has a Bluetooth and WiFi antenna embedded into the rear panel with a power switch allowing you to switch between DC or AC power supply.

settings.title: What is the output power like?
settings.content: Balanced (XLR4/4.4mm, USB DAC/OPT/COAX, Ultra high): L+R≥3650mW+3650mW (32Ω，THD+N＜1%) Single-Ended (6.35mm, USB DAC/OPT/COAX, Ultra high): L+R≥1250mW+1250mW (32Ω，THD+N＜1%)

settings.title: Does it support streaming?
settings.content: Yep! You can download streaming apps from Google Play Store like Tidal, Spotify, Apple music, etc.

settings.title: What is the Android version that it supports?
settings.content: It supports Android 10 Open OS.

settings.title: What DAC chips are incorporated into the FiiO R7?
settings.content: For the brand-new FiiO R7 has incorporated an ESS Sabre ES9068AS DAC chip in its circuitry.

settings.title: Have a question? Get in touch!
settings.content: Check out the most common questions our customers ask. Still have questions? Talk to our Headphone Gurus.
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 11am-6pm.
